slideMain.title: Welcome to CAMPUS
slideMain.text: The new app to use during your coffee break to get updates on the campus life!

slideEvents.title: Stay up to date
slideEvents.text: CAMPUS allows you to be aware of any event occurring on the campus, from pancake sales to Enfoiros concerts!

slideProxiwash.title: Never forget your laundry
slideProxiwash.text: CAMPUS will inform you on the availability of washing machines and will remind you just before yours finishes!

slidePlanex.title: Planex
slidePlanex.text: Lookup your next course on CAMPUS with a mobile friendly timetable

slideRU.title: RU Menu
slideRU.text: For the hungry, check this week's menu!

slideServices.title: More services!
slideServices.text: You can do much more with CAMPUS, explore the app to find out

slideDone.title: Made by a student
slideDone.text: This app is the work of one student (with some help here and there), so any feedback is appreciated!

updateSlide0.title: New in this update!
updateSlide0.text:
Faster than ever and easier to use!
This update includes lots of changes to improve your experience.
Use the brand new feedback button on the home screen to talk to the developer!

updateSlide1.title: Improved Planex!
updateSlide1.text: You now have access to new controls, improved display, and you can also mark groups as favorites.

updateSlide2.title: Scanotron 3000!
updateSlide2.text:
Say hello to Scanotron 3000!
Available from the Qr-Code button on the home screen, it will help you get information about clubs and events around the campus.
(Useless right now but we have hope for next year)

updateSlide3.title: Amicale Account!
updateSlide3.text:
You can now connect to your Amicale INSAT account from within the app! See all available clubs and more to come!
Click on the login button from the home screen.

aprilFoolsSlide.title: New in this update!
aprilFoolsSlide.text:
We heard you, you don't like the new design and colors, so we changed them!
Love.

settingsScreen.startScreenSub: Select which screen to start the app on

aboutScreen.buttonDesc: Information about the app and its creator
aboutScreen.author: Author and maintainer

proximoScreen.description: The Proximo is your small grocery store maintained by students directly on the campus. Open every day from 18h30 to 19h30, we welcome you when you are short on pastas or sodas ! Different products for different problems, everything at cost price. You can pay by Lydia or cash.

proxiwashScreen.error: Could not update machines state. Pull down to retry.
proxiwashScreen.description: This is the washing service operated by Promologis for INSA's residences (We don't mind if you do not live on the campus and you do your laundry here). The room is right next to the R2, with 3 dryers and 9 washers, is open 7d/7 24h/24 ! Here you can check their availability ! You can bring your own detergent, use the one given on site or buy it at the Proximo (cheaper than the one given by the machines ). You can pay by credit card or cash.
proxiwashScreen.paymentMethodsDescription:
Cash up until 10€.
Credit Card also accepted.
proxiwashScreen.washerProcedure:
Put your laundry in the tumble without tamping it and by respecting charge limits.

Close the machine's door.

Choose a program using one of the four favorite program buttons.

Pay to the command central, then press the START button on the machine.

When the program is finished, the screen indicates 'Programme terminé', press the yellow button to open the lid and retrieve your laundry.
proxiwashScreen.washerTips:
Program 'blanc/couleur': 6kg of dry laundry (cotton linen, linen, underwear, sheets, jeans, towels).

Program 'non repassable': 3,5 kg of dry laundry (synthetic fibre linen, cotton and polyester mixed).

Program 'fin 30°C': 2,5 kg of dry laundry (delicate linen in synthetic fibres).

Program 'laine 30°C': 2,5 kg of dry laundry (wool textiles).
proxiwashScreen.dryerProcedure:
Put your laundry in the tumble without tamping it and by respecting charge limits.

Close the machine's door.

Choose a program using one of the four favorite program buttons.

Pay to the command central, then press the START button on the machine.
proxiwashScreen.dryerTips: The advised dryer length is 35 minutes for 14 kg of laundry. You can choose a shorter length if the dryer is not fully charged.
proxiwashScreen.enableNotificationsTip: Click on a running machine to enable notifications

modal.finished: This machine is finished. If you started it, you can get back your laundry.
modal.ready: This machine is empty and ready to use.
modal.running:
This machine has been started at %{start} and will end at %{end}.
Remaining time: %{remaining} min
modal.broken: This machine is broken and cannot be used. Thank you for your comprehension.
modal.error: There has been an error and we are unable to get information from this machine. Sorry for the inconvenience.
modal.notificationErrorDescription: Impossible to create notifications. Please make sure you enabled notifications then restart the app.

notifications.machineFinishedBody: The machine n°{{number}} is finished and your laundry is ready to pickup
notifications.machineRunningBody: The machine n°{{number}} is still running

planexScreen.enableStartScreen: Come here often? Set it as default screen!
planexScreen.noGroupSelected: No group selected. Please select your group using the big beautiful red button bellow.

profileScreen.clubsSubtitle: Click on a club to show its information
profileScreen.membershipSubtitle: Allows you to take part in various activities

scannerScreen.errorPermission:
Scanotron 3000 needs access to the camera in order to scan QR codes.
The camera will never be used for any other purpose.
scannerScreen.errorMessage: The QR code scanned could not be recognised, please make sure it is valid.
scannerScreen.helpMessage: Find Campus QR codes posted by clubs and events, scan them and get instant access to detailed information!

loginScreen.title: Amicale account
loginScreen.subtitle: Please enter your credentials
loginScreen.whyAccountSub: What can you do wth an account
loginScreen.whyAccountParagraph: An Amicale account allows you to take part in several activities around campus. You can join a club, or even create your own!
loginScreen.whyAccountParagraph2: Logging into your Amicale account on the app will allow you to see all available clubs on the campus, vote for the upcoming elections, and more to come!
loginScreen.noAccount: No Account? Go to the Amicale's building during open hours to create one.

errors.title: Error!
errors.badToken: You are not logged in. Please login and try again.
errors.noConsent: You did not give your consent for data processing to the Amicale.
errors.forbidden: You do not have access to this data.
errors.connectionError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.

clubs.managersSubtitle: These people make the club live
clubs.categoriesFilterMessage: Click on a category to filter the list
clubs.invalidClub: Could not find the club. Please make sure the club you are trying to access is valid.

about.text: The clubs, making the campus live, with more than sixty clubs offering various activities! From the philosophy club to the PABI (Production Artisanale de Bière Insaienne), without forgetting the multiple music and dance clubs, you will surely find an activity that suits you!
about.title: A question ?
about.subtitle: Ask the Amicale
about.message:
You have a question concerning the clubs?
You want to revive or create a club?
Contact the Amicale at the following address:

amicaleAbout.title: A question ?
amicaleAbout.subtitle: Ask the Amicale
amicaleAbout.message:
You want to revive a club?
You want to start a new project?
Here are al the contacts you need! Do not hesitate to write a mail or send a message to the Amicale's Facebook page!

select.title: Elections open
select.subtitle: Vote now!
select.dialogMessage: Are you sure you want to send your vote? You will not be able to change it.

title.title: The Elections
title.subtitle: Why your vote is important
title.paragraph1:
The Amicale's elections is the right moment for you to choose the next team, which will handle different projects on the campus, help organizing your favorite events, animate the campus life during the whole year, and relay your ideas to the administration, so that your campus life is the most enjoyable possible!
Your turn to make a change!😉
title.paragraph2: Note: If there is only one list, it is still important to vote to show your support, so that the administration knows the current list is supported by students. It is always a plus when taking difficult decisions! 😉

disconnect.title: Disconnect
disconnect.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect from your Amicale account?

general.networkError: Unable to contact servers. Make sure you are connected to Internet.

restart.confirm: Are you sure you want to restart?
restart.confirmMessage: You will lose you progress, continue?

planningScreen.invalidEvent: Could not find the event. Please make sure the event you are trying to access is valid.

feedbackScreen.bugsSubtitle: Did you find a bug? Let us know!
feedbackScreen.bugsDescription: Reporting bugs helps us make the app better. To do so, use one of the buttons below and be as precise as possible when describing your problem!
feedbackScreen.feedbackSubtitle: Let us know what you think!
feedbackScreen.feedbackDescription: Do you have a feature you want to be added/changed/removed, want to give your opinion on the app or simply chat with the dev? Use one of the links below!
feedbackScreen.contactMeans: Using Gitea is recommended, to use it simply login with your INSA account.
